ISBN 0394558235 Publisher: Alfred a Knopf Inc, 1988 Westminister, Maryland, U.S.A.: Alfred a Knopf Inc, 1988. 1st Edition 1st Printing. Hardcover. Fine/Fine. First Edition/First Printing 1988. A stunning fine copy in a fine and unclipped dustjacket. This copy is boldly signed by Anne Rice in gold metallic on the title page. Some very minor edgewear to the dustjacket and a few tiny specks to the top edge-otherwise a bright and crisp copy of Book Three of "The Vampire Chronicles"-the immensely popular series by Anne Rice. Entire series...

ISBN 0394558235 Publisher: Alfred a Knopf Inc, 1988 Westminister, Maryland, U.S.A.: Alfred a Knopf Inc, 1988. 1st Edition 1st Printing. Hardcover. Fine/Fine. First Edition/ First Printing 1988. A handsome copy in fine condition in an unclipped and fine dustjacket. This copy is signed and inscribed to a bookseller "For -" by the author on the front free endpaper. There is a very minor fleck to the top page edge only-otherwise would be very fine. the dustjacket is flawless. Book III of "The Vampire Chronicles" started in 1976 with "Interview...

ISBN 0394558235 Publisher: Alfred A. Knopf, 1988 New York: Alfred A. Knopf. Near Fine in Near Fine dust jacket. 1988. First Edition; First Printing; Signed by Author. 1/4 Cloth. 0394558235 . Publisher: Alfred A. Knopf, 1988 New York: Alfred A. Knopf. 1988. First. First edition. Corners a trifle bumped, else fine in fine dustwrapper. Signed by the author. The third installment in The Vampire Chronicles, basis for the film with Aaliyah and Stuart Townsend. . First edition. Signed.
